title: A true relation of a great discovery intended against Hull sent in a letter by Sir John Hotham to both houses of Parliament ; with a true copy of a letter sent from Master Beckwith, a recusant, to Lieutenant Fooks his son in law, in service at Hull under Sir IohnHotham ; also three proclamations lately sent from the Kings Most Excellent Majestie from Yorke.
author: Hotham, John, Sir, d. 1645 Jan. 2.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F. Coules and T Bates,
